I would recommend "Sleepers" to someone who enjoys suspenseful thrillers.

The movie follows a group of teenagers who are sent to a detention center after getting into trouble with their parents. 

As time goes by, the teenagers begin to realize that they are being used as pawns in a much larger political game involving powerful and corrupt individuals on both sides of the political spectrum.

As the teenagers begin to realize the true extent of the political game being played against them, they must decide whether or not to continue playing along with the powers that be and risk losing everything they have ever worked so hard for to those very same powers that be who are using their power to manipulate and control others.
